alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Fayette; Franklin; Hocking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:52AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FRANKLIN, SOUTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD, NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN HOCKING, PICKAWAY, SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 430 AM EDT... At 352 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near South Bloomfield, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Washington Court House, Circleville, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, Obetz, Commercial Point, Royalton, Lithopolis, Fox, and Amanda. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 80 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Fayette; Franklin; Hocking; Pickaway; Ross
